# addMenuItem(with:title:action:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an action to the context menu by using an image provided by your WatchKit extension.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addMenuItem(with image: UIImage, title: String, action: Selector)
```

## Parameters

- **image**: The template image to be used for the action. Only the alpha channel of the image is used. This parameter must not be `nil`. For information about the dimensions for menu images, see [https://developer.apple.com/watch/human-interface-guidelines/].
- **title**: The title string to be displayed underneath the image. Title strings should be reasonably short. Any text that cannot be displayed is truncated. This parameter must not be `nil` or an empty string.
- **action**: The action method to be called when the action is tapped. The method must be defined on the current interface controller object. This parameter must not be `nil`.

## Discussion

Use this method to append an action to the interface controller’s context menu. If the menu already has four items, additional items are ignored.

## Deprecated symbols

- **Text Response Key**: Keys for retrieving text response information.
- **addMenuItem(withImageNamed:title:action:)**: Adds an action to the context menu using an existing image resource in your Watch app bundle.
- **addMenuItem(with:title:action:)**: Adds an action to the context menu using a system-provided icon.
- **beginGlanceUpdates()**: Tells the system that you are about to start a potentially lengthy update task for your glance.
- **clearAllMenuItems()**: Removes all programmatically added actions from the context menu.
- **endGlanceUpdates()**: Tells the system that you finished updating your glance content.
- **handleUserActivity(_:)**: Responds to Handoff–related activity.
- **presentController(_:)**: Presents a page-based interface modally.
- **reloadRootControllers(withNames:contexts:)**: Loads the specified interface controllers and rebuilds the app’s page-based interface.
- **updateUserActivity(_:userInfo:webpageURL:)**: Registers the current user activity with the system.
- **WKMenuItemIcon**: Template images that you can use for menus.
